name: Computer Physics Simulator 2020
description:
Computer Physics Simulator 2020 - inovation simulator about construct PC with physics of parts. There you can using operating system, using security camera(for watch street), listen music, watching videos and photos, play in app about running cube, that avoid oponent cubes.
In this simulator you can borrow parts of computer: Videokart, RAM, Water Cooling System, Motherboard, Computer chassis. You can borrow some furniture(chairs, armchair, tables, TV), that have physics, this way you can arrrange the furniture as you want.
In this simulator you can build Computer of your Dream!
The sequel is here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1828550
Quarry Simulator is here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1301500/Quarry_Simulator_2021/
